EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-08-01-Cloud-Native-Hypervisor.ES-2018-07-25-Cloud-Native-Hypervisor-Pro
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invitation | The Impact of Cloud Native on IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-native-hypervisor-webinar/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You are invited to join us on August 1st, at 11am ET, as a distinguished panel of technical experts discuss the impact of cloud native on IT and how you can prepare for the coming onslaught of complexity. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-native-hypervisor-webinar//]]>
In this live,Â 60-minute discussion and demo session <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-native-hypervisor-webinar/]]>, you will learn how the growing adoption of cloud native and distributed architectures are forcing organizations to change the way they approach their unique digital transformations.
See you there!
Regards, Andrew
